languages.text: "Жестокая казнь Токары сделала из него мученика, Ваша Светлость. Изначально эта вокс-трансляция должна была звучать лишь на Футфоле, но мятежники смогли вывезти ее копии за пределы станции и начать распространять среди населения других миров. На записи Владайм обличает правосудие Империума, и призывает бороться против него. Обездоленные и недовольные граждане видят в нем символ борьбы с несправедливостью жестокой системы".

traits.locale_text: "Жестокая казнь Токары сделала из него мученика, Ваша Светлость. Изначально эта вокс-трансляция должна была звучать лишь на Футфоле, но мятежники смогли вывезти ее копии за пределы станции и начать распространять среди населения других миров. На записи Владайм обличает правосудие Империума, и призывает бороться против него. Обездоленные и недовольные граждане видят в нем символ борьбы с несправедливостью жестокой системы".

languages.text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."
languages.original_text: "Жестокая казнь Токары сделала из него мученика, Ваша Светлость. Изначально эта вокс-трансляция должна была звучать лишь на Футфоле, но мятежники смогли вывезти ее копии за пределы станции и начать распространять среди населения других миров. На записи Владайм обличает правосудие Империума, и призывает бороться против него. Обездоленные и недовольные граждане видят в нем символ борьбы с несправедливостью жестокой системы".

traits.locale_text: "Tocara's cruel execution turned him into a martyr, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially this vox-transmission was meant to sound only on Footfall, but rebellions managed to bring it beyond the station and started spreading it among the citizens of other worlds. In this recording Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and encourages to stand against it. Deprived and dissatisfied citizens see it as a symbol of fighting with the injustice of the cruel system."

"Tocara's cruel execution turned him into a martyr, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. languages.text: “由于托卡拉遭受了残忍的处决，人民将他当成了烈士，大人。最开始，这些录音只在落脚港上播放，但叛乱分子却将录音的副本传播到了落脚港之外，传播到了其他世界的公民之中。在这段录音里，弗拉迪姆谴责了帝国的制度，并励人们站起来公开反对。对那些被剥夺了权利以及心怀不满的公民而言，托卡拉成为了反抗残酷与不公的英雄。”
languages.original_text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."

traits.locale_text: “由于托卡拉遭受了残忍的处决，人民将他当成了烈士，大人。最开始，这些录音只在落脚港上播放，但叛乱分子却将录音的副本传播到了落脚港之外，传播到了其他世界的公民之中。在这段录音里，弗拉迪姆谴责了帝国的制度，并励人们站起来公开反对。对那些被剥夺了权利以及心怀不满的公民而言，托卡拉成为了反抗残酷与不公的英雄。”

languages.text: « La terrible exécution de Tocara l'a élevé au rang de martyr, Votre Seigneurie. Au départ, la transmission-vox n'était destinée qu'à Castel, mais les rebelles sont parvenus à faire circuler des copies au-delà de la station et à les distribuer aux habitants d'autres mondes. Dans cet enregistrement, Vladaym dénonce la justice de l'Imperium et exhorte la population à se dresser contre elle. Les citoyens démunis et mécontents voient en lui le symbole de leur lutte contre l'iniquité et la cruauté du système. »
languages.original_text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."

traits.locale_text: « La terrible exécution de Tocara l'a élevé au rang de martyr, Votre Seigneurie. Au départ, la transmission-vox n'était destinée qu'à Castel, mais les rebelles sont parvenus à faire circuler des copies au-delà de la station et à les distribuer aux habitants d'autres mondes. Dans cet enregistrement, Vladaym dénonce la justice de l'Imperium et exhorte la population à se dresser contre elle. Les citoyens démunis et mécontents voient en lui le symbole de leur lutte contre l'iniquité et la cruauté du système. »

languages.text: "Tocaras brutale Hinrichtung machte ihn zum Märtyrer, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eigentlich sollte diese Voxübertragung nur auf Footfall zu hören sein, aber die Rebellen schafften es irgendwie, die Kopien außerhalb der Station zu verbreiten und so die Bewohner anderer Welten zu erreichen. In dieser Aufnahme prangert Vladaym die Justiz des Imperiums an und ruft dazu auf, sich ihr zu widersetzen. Für die Bedürftigen und Unzufriedenen ist er ein Symbol für ihren Kampf gegen die Missstände eines brutalen Systems."
languages.original_text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."

traits.locale_text: "Tocaras brutale Hinrichtung machte ihn zum Märtyrer, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eigentlich sollte diese Voxübertragung nur auf Footfall zu hören sein, aber die Rebellen schafften es irgendwie, die Kopien außerhalb der Station zu verbreiten und so die Bewohner anderer Welten zu erreichen. In dieser Aufnahme prangert Vladaym die Justiz des Imperiums an und ruft dazu auf, sich ihr zu widersetzen. Für die Bedürftigen und Unzufriedenen ist er ein Symbol für ihren Kampf gegen die Missstände eines brutalen Systems."

"Tocaras grausame Hinrichtung machte ihn zum Märtyrer, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eigentlich sollte diese Voxübertragung nur auf Footfall zu hören sein, aber die Aufständischen schafften es irgendwie, die Kopien außerhalb der Station zu verbreiten und so die Bürger anderer Welten zu erreichen. In dieser Aufnahme prangert Vladaym die Justiz des Imperiums an und ruft dazu auf, sich ihr zu widersetzen. Bedürftige und unzufriedene Bürger sehen in ihm ein Symbol für ihren Kampf gegen die Ungerechtigkeiten eines brutalen Systems."

languages.text: «Tras su ejecución, Tocara se convirtió en un mártir, {mf|milord|milady}. Al principio, esta transmisión de voco solo se iba a emitir en Paso, pero los rebeldes consiguieron copiarla y difundirla para que la escuchara la población de otros mundos. En ella, Vladaym denuncia la justicia del Imperium e incita a oponerse a él. Los ciudadanos más desfavorecidos e insatisfechos lo consideran un símbolo de su lucha contra las injusticias de un sistema despiadado».
languages.original_text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."

traits.locale_text: «Tras su ejecución, Tocara se convirtió en un mártir, {mf|milord|milady}. Al principio, esta transmisión de voco solo se iba a emitir en Paso, pero los rebeldes consiguieron copiarla y difundirla para que la escuchara la población de otros mundos. En ella, Vladaym denuncia la justicia del Imperium e incita a oponerse a él. Los ciudadanos más desfavorecidos e insatisfechos lo consideran un símbolo de su lucha contra las injusticias de un sistema despiadado».

languages.text: 「トカラの陰惨な処刑によって、彼は殉教者となりました、陛下。当初、このヴォクス放送はフットフォールでのみ流される予定でしたが、反乱者たちはそのコピーをステーションの外へと拡散し、他の惑星の民衆にまで広めました。この録音の中でヴラダイムは帝国の正義を糾弾し、人々にそれに立ち向かうよう扇動しています。困窮し不満を抱く人々は、彼を残酷な体制の不正に抗う戦いの象徴と見なしているのです」
languages.original_text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."

traits.locale_text: 「トカラの陰惨な処刑によって、彼は殉教者となりました、陛下。当初、このヴォクス放送はフットフォールでのみ流される予定でしたが、反乱者たちはそのコピーをステーションの外へと拡散し、他の惑星の民衆にまで広めました。この録音の中でヴラダイムは帝国の正義を糾弾し、人々にそれに立ち向かうよう扇動しています。困窮し不満を抱く人々は、彼を残酷な体制の不正に抗う戦いの象徴と見なしているのです」

languages.text: "İdamından sonra Tocara, halkın gözünde bir şehit hâline geldi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu voks yayını başta sadece Binliman'da oynatılacaktı ama kopyaları bir şekilde isyancılar tarafından istasyon dışına sızdırıldı ve başka dünyaların halklarına da dinletildi. Vladaym; kayıtta İmparatorluk'un adaletini topa tutuyor, halkı ayaklanmaya teşvik ediyor. Âcizler ve nankörler, zalim sistemin haksızlıklarına karşı verdikleri mücadelede kendisini bir sembol olarak görüyor."
languages.original_text: "Tocara's grim execution turned him into a martyr, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Initially, this vox-cast was meant to sound only on Footfall, but the rebels managed to spread copies of it beyond the station and disseminated them among the populations of other worlds. In the recording, Vladaym denounces the Imperium's justice and incites others to stand against it. The deprived and the dissatisfied see him as a symbol of their fight against the wrongs of the cruel system."
